articles.title: Arpico Insurance appoints Rohan Muttiah to its Board of Directors
articles.summary: Arpico Insurance PLC, a subsidiary of Richard Pieris Group, has appointed Rohan Muttiah to its Board of Directors. Rohan has over 45 years of experience across diverse sectors. His career highlights include pioneering Sri Lanka's first Banking Payment Hub, spearheading the adoption of Ripple Blockchain, and driving exponential growth in Mobile Banking. He has also represented Sri Lanka at the Council of Europe's Budapest Convention on Cyber Crime.
